tool_description: A complete API to make customized QR codes with logo, dynamic QR codes to track data, QR codes in bulk for consumer products. We offer PNG as SVG format for professional use. Many major brands use our API.  For more information contact us on: info@qrzebra.com
name: Custom QR-Code with Logo and Data Tracking
title: Custom QR-Code with Logo and Data Tracking
tool_name: Custom QR-Code with Logo and Data Tracking

api_list.name: Get your all QR code list
api_list.description: List all custom Visual QR code with this API. This will return all the campaign of Dynamic QR which you can easily track for visitors.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Query limit for No. of campaign per page (Default 5)

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: List all campaign by Date(1) or Name(2)

api_list.name: GET Track Data
api_list.description: Track your Custom QR code Data by No. Of scans, Country, City, Device type

optional_parameters.name: period
optional_parameters.description: GET Tracking Data by “day” (Day viz data of current day/ today) “week” (Day viz data of current week) “month” (Day viz data of current month) “months” (Month viz data of the current year) “year” (Yearly data)
